emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.creator: admin
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.title: 【CPack通知】制品分发任务执行成功
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.body:
【CPack通知】制品分发任务执行成功
蓝鲸DevOps平台的通知推送

尊敬的用户，您好！

制品分发任务已执行成功。


任务名称：#{taskName}

分发详情：同步类型-#{replicaType}，目标节点-#{remoteClusters}，同步仓库-#{localRepo}

完成时间：#{time}


查看详情

如有任何问题，可随时联系蓝盾助手。
你收到此邮件，是因为你关注了[#{taskName}]任务，或其他人@了你

emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.creator: admin
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.title: 【CPack通知】制品扫描任务已完成
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.body:
【CPack通知】制品扫描任务已完成
蓝鲸DevOps平台的通知推送

尊敬的用户，您好！

制品扫描任务已完成。


方案名称：#{planName}

完成时间：#{completionTime}

扫描报告已生成，请查看详细的 扫描结果 。


如有任何问题，可随时联系蓝盾助手。
你收到此邮件，是因为你关注了[#{planName}]方案，或其他人@了你

emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.creator: admin
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.title: 【CPack通知】制品扫描任务已中止
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.body:
【CPack通知】制品扫描任务已中止
蓝鲸DevOps平台的通知推送

尊敬的用户，您好！

制品扫描任务已被中止。


方案名称：#{planName}

终止时间：#{completionTime}

中止人：#{operator}

查看详情


如有任何问题，可随时联系蓝盾助手。
你收到此邮件，是因为你关注了[#{planName}]方案，或其他人@了你

emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.creator: admin
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.title: 【CPack通知】制品分发任务开始
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.body:
【CPack通知】制品分发任务已开始执行
蓝鲸DevOps平台的通知推送

尊敬的用户，您好！

制品分发任务已开始执行。


任务名称：#{taskName}

分发详情：同步类型-#{replicaType}，目标节点-#{remoteClusters}，同步仓库-#{localRepo}

开始时间：#{time}

请耐心等待分发完成。


查看详情


如有任何问题，可随时联系蓝盾助手。
你收到此邮件，是因为你关注了[#{taskName}]任务，或其他人@了你

emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.creator: admin
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.title: 【CPack通知】制品分发任务失败
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.body:
【CPack通知】制品分发任务执行失败
蓝鲸DevOps平台的通知推送

尊敬的用户，您好！

制品分发任务执行失败。


任务名称：#{taskName}

分发详情：同步类型-#{replicaType}，目标节点-#{remoteClusters}，同步仓库-#{localRepo}

失败时间：#{time}


查看详情

如有任何问题，可随时联系蓝盾助手。
你收到此邮件，是因为你关注了[#{taskName}]任务，或其他人@了你

emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.creator: admin
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.title: [CPack Alert]The artifact distribution task has been completed.
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.body:
[CPack Alert]The artifact distribution task has been completed.
Notification push from BlueKing DevOps platform

Dear User!

The artifact distribution task has been completed.


Task Name: #{taskName}

Distribution Details: Synchronization Type-#{replicaType}, Target Nodes-#{remoteClusters}, Synchronization Repository-#{localRepo}

Completion Time: #{time}


View details

If you have any questions, feel free to contact the BlueShield Assistant.
You received this email because you are following the [#{taskName}] task

emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.creator: admin
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.title: [CPack Alert]The artifact scanning task has been completed.
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.body:
[CPack Alert]The artifact scanning task has been completed.
Notification push from BlueKing DevOps platform

Dear User!

The artifact scanning task has been completed.


Plan Name: #{planName}

Completion Time: #{completionTime}

The scan report has been generated.Please check the detailed scan results 。


If you have any questions, feel free to contact the BlueShield Assistant.
You received this email because you are following the [#{planName}] plan

emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.creator: admin
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.title: [CPack Alert]The artifact scanning task has been stopped.
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.body:
[CPack Alert]The artifact scanning task has been stopped.
Notification push from BlueKing DevOps platform

Dear User!

The artifact scanning task has been stopped.


Plan Name: #{planName}

Completion Time: #{completionTime}

Terminator:#{operator}

View details


If you have any questions, feel free to contact the BlueShield Assistant.
You received this email because you are following the [#{planName}] plan

emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.creator: admin
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.title: [CPack Alert]The artifact distribution task begins.
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.body:
[CPack Alert]The artifact distribution task has begun execution.
Notification push from BlueKing DevOps platform

Dear User!

The artifact distribution task has begun execution.


Task Name: #{taskName}

Distribution Details: Synchronization Type-#{replicaType}, Target Nodes-#{remoteClusters}, Synchronization Repository-#{localRepo}

Start time: #{time}

Please be patient while the distribution completes.


View details


If you have any questions, feel free to contact the BlueShield Assistant.
You received this email because you are following the [#{taskName}] task

emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.creator: admin
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.title: [CPack Alert]The artifact distribution task failed to be executed.
emailNotifyMessageTemplateJson.body:
[CPack Alert]The artifact distribution task failed to be executed.
Notification push from BlueKing DevOps platform

Dear User!

The artifact distribution task failed to be executed.


Task Name: #{taskName}

Distribution Details: Synchronization Type-#{replicaType}, Target Nodes-#{remoteClusters}, Synchronization Repository-#{localRepo}

Failed time: #{time}


View details

If you have any questions, feel free to contact the BlueShield Assistant.
You received this email because you are following the [#{taskName}] task
